messages: I need to develop RIOT code on an ESP32 to achieve RTC alarms. It sets the date to June 1, 2024, and triggers an alarm after 5 seconds, printing "Alarm triggered!" upon activation.

Now, try again. Check the error information: ["/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:23:22: error: passing argument 1 of 'rtc_set_time' makes pointer from integer without a cast [-Werror=int-conversion]", "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:28:5: error: unknown type name 'rtc_ts_t'", "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:29:18: error: passing argument 1 of 'rtc_get_time' from incompatible pointer type [-Werror=incompatible-pointer-types]", "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:32:5: error: unknown type name 'rtc_alarm_t'; did you mean 'rtc_alarm_cb_t'?", '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:33:9: error: field name not in record or union initializer', '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:34:9: error: field name not in record or union initializer', '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:34:21: error: excess elements in scalar initializer [-Werror]', '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:35:9: error: field name not in record or union initializer', '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:35:16: error: excess elements in scalar initializer [-Werror]', "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:38:23: error: passing argument 1 of 'rtc_set_alarm' from incompatible pointer type [-Werror=incompatible-pointer-types]", "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:38:9: error: too few arguments to function 'rtc_set_alarm'"] and Invoke the code tool to solve the error and structure the output with a prefix and code block.
